work_speed.label: Work Speed
work_speed.description: Determines how fast the front end moves when it’s working.

jog_speed.label: Jog Speed
jog_speed.description: Determines how fast the front end moves when it’s not working.

dwell_time.label: Dwell Time
dwell_time.description: Pause DexArm and wait before turning ON laser. It helps improve laser engraving quality.

engrave_time.label: Engrave Time
engrave_time.description: Determines how long the laser keeps on when it's engraving a dot.

power.label: Power
power.description: Power to use when laser is working.

multi_pass.label: Multi-Pass
multi_pass.description: When enabled, the Arm will run the G-code multiple times automatically according to the below settings. This feature helps you cut materials that can't be cut with only one pass.

passes.label: Passes
passes.description: Determines how many times the printer will run the G-code automatically.

pass_depth.label: Pass Depth
pass_depth.description: Determines how much the laser module will be lowered after each pass.
